title: How to Add an Email Account on Android

steps.title: Open Gmail on your Android.
steps.content: Open Gmail on your Android. It's the red and white envelope icon that's usually on the home screen.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It's at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. It's near the top-left corner of the menu. The menu now displays fewer options.

steps.title: Select an email provider.
steps.content: Select an email provider. If you're adding another Gmail address, select Google . Otherwise: If your email address ends with outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com, select Outlook, Hotmail, and Live . If you use Office 365 or the Microsoft Outlook application for email, select Exchange . [1] X Research source Tap Yahoo if you have a Yahoo! Mail account. If you have a POP or IMAP account, see this method .

steps.title: Enter the email address you want to add.
steps.content: Enter the email address you want to add.

steps.title: Tap Next.
steps.content: Tap Next . This brings you to the password screen.

steps.title: Tap Next.
steps.content: Tap Next . Once your password is authenticated, you'll be signed in to the account.

steps.title: Tap I AGREE.
steps.content: Tap I AGREE . The text may vary by account, but you'll usually have to give the Gmail app permission to access your messages. Once you're finished, your new account is ready to use.

steps.title: Switch between email accounts.
steps.content: Switch between email accounts. Here's how you can switch between mailboxes to view all of your mail: [2] X Research source Tap ☰ at the top-left corner of Gmail. Tap the down arrow to the right of your username. Select the account you want to use. This opens the inbox for that account. You can send and receive messages from the new account on this screen. To switch back to the other account, tap ☰, tap the down arrow, and select that account.

steps.title: Select a service type.
steps.content: Select a service type. You can get this information from your email provider. Most providers use POP3 or IMAP. Exchange is often used in office environments.

steps.title: Enter your email password.
steps.content: Enter your email password. If you're using Exchange, tap Select to choose a client certificate if instructed by your administrator.

steps.title: Enter the server details as prompted.
steps.content: Enter the server details as prompted. This information comes from your email provider. Follow the on-screen instructions to enter all of the requested information to complete the setup process. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Switch between email accounts.
steps.content: Switch between email accounts. Now that you've set up your new account, here's how you can switch between mailboxes to view all of your mail: [4] X Research source Tap ☰ at the top-left corner of Gmail. Tap the down arrow to the right of your username. Select the account you want to use. This opens the inbox for that account. You can send a receive messages from the new account on this screen. To switch back to the other account, tap ☰, tap the down arrow, and select that account.
